wikipedia_page.main: Keith Bentley is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1970s, 1980s and 1990s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, and at club level for Widnes (Heritage №), Barrow, Salford (two spells), and Leigh (Heritage № 965), as a wing or centre, i.e. number 2 or 5, or, 3 or 4.
